website_summaries.verdict: Medium chain triglycerides (MCTs) to fuel the body and mind, this supplement comes from a recognized manufacturer.
pros: Produced in a facility that avoids allergens like shellfish, soy, wheat, and yeast
From coconut and palm kernel oil
cons: It may irritate the GI tract
Should be taken with food to avoid stomach upset

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really gives the go...
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. I've used several different types of MCT oil, and this one packs the greatest punch hands down! I blend some in my coffee with a little heavy whipping cream in the mornings and it gives me such great focus and really warms me up on cold mornings. I totally recommend it, it really enhances your energy levels. Also great for doing Keto and feeling full. I wish that it didn't have palm oil simply because of the environmental impact of the palm industry but all in all it's still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Koopman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MCT OIL
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time. I am on a reducing weight program and they suggest using this. I love it! I can fry with it and use it in my homemade salad dressing, it is a good product, especially if you are on a reducing plan because it burns as energy in your body and doesn't store as fat.
customer_reviews.author: Marian M.

customer_reviews.title: Now Foods MCT Oil
customer_reviews.text: Good Product. Not in glass bottle as stated. It is in plastic. Please correct. Took off one star for that
customer_reviews.author: Essence56

customer_reviews.title: No upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: This works great daily in my coffee and doesn't upset my stomach like some of the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: A. G. ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to take.
customer_reviews.text: I take a Tab. each day for my Keto diet. I don’t like to drink straight oil but if I have too, this is the best one to take. There is no taste.
customer_reviews.author: California Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great value MCT oil
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reasonably priced MCT oil to use for bulletproof coffee. I found this multi-pack item on Amazon. It seems the best deal is currently the 3-pack. This MCT oil is completely tasteless and blends very well in shakes and smoothies. If you're looking to use this as a dietary supplement I can recommend it. I've been able to consistently maintain my weight using a few tbsps of this oil every morning. Like most NOW foods products I'm impressed by the price and quality of the product. I've purchased 12 bottles of this so far!
customer_reviews.author: ank

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using MCT Oil for about 1 year now. I've used Natural Factors brand as well but could not honestly say there is any difference between products. My greatest motivation for buying Now brand is two-fold, 1) The Brand is Trustworthy & 2) The Value is unbeatable. The product is practically tasteless which I appreciate because I add about an ounce into my daily protein shake.
customer_reviews.author: Chelli

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of the Vanilla Hazelnut & it helps with weight management
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Frutiger

customer_reviews.title: I’ll just use it for salad dressing but won’t buy again ...
customer_reviews.text: Tasteless, get a lot of product for the money. I just have a hard time taking it either alone or mixed in a beverage. It coats my throat and makes me cough quite a bit. It also does NOT curb my appetite at all.
customer_reviews.author: SRC

customer_reviews.title: Adds nice flavor
customer_reviews.text: My customers like this and say it adds a nice flavor to their coffee, even though I don't see flavoring as an ingredient. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite brands of MCT oils.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We purchase often. We are keto. Great price, fast and easy purchasing
customer_reviews.author: margaret perry

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I mix 1-2 Tablespoons in my protein shake every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Jack

customer_reviews.title: RESULTS IN HOT FLASHES
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me Hot Flashes and I noticed depression after taking it.I began cooking with it which didnt have the same effect.I wont purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Perie

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This brand of MTC oil has the proper proportions of C-8 and C-10 medium chain oils. A great value for the money. Highly recomende.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth halloran

customer_reviews.title: Very finely wrapped, no spills. Oil seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very finely wrapped, no spills. Oil seems to be helping me for the problem I have. It is clean and has no order.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Harris

customer_reviews.title: weight loss
customer_reviews.text: I'm still in the beginning phase, not sure if it's in my head or not, but I feel like I have more energy!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: USPS delivered.
customer_reviews.text: I liked getting this product in a light protected glass, well-package and delivered by my USPS at my doorstep!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a repeat buyer. Love this product, I add it to my coffee in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better pricing witht he multiple pack, and since I use it daily, it was worth ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Caspersen

customer_reviews.title: Now Foods MCT Oil - 32 oz. ( Multi-Pack)
customer_reviews.text: Now Foods MCT Oil - 32 oz. ( Multi-Pack), great value pack, great price. Tried it for several months and now trying Vitimin C instead, which seems to be easier on system. Highly recommend. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: rand

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Amazon and Now Foods
customer_reviews.text: Happy that Amazon sells this as I can't find it locally. I mix this with organic coconut oil and find it helpful for memory.
customer_reviews.author: loisdiane

customer_reviews.title: Best out of 5
customer_reviews.text: I have had 5 different MCT oils after listening to Joe Rogan podcast preaching about these for a few years. I have been specifically using this in my daily coffee and then my protein shakes. I normally have oily skin and was afraid ingesting more oil would add to it or mess with my skin. It didnt. There are no side effects. Really cheap MCT oil has properties and the taste of coconut oil.. This one didnt. MCT oil may reduce lactate buildup in athletes and help use fat for energy. That's my next step to see how my gains are in my HIIT workouts.
customer_reviews.author: warmsnowman

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT a three pack. There is only one. It is false advertising.
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine and I have been using it for several years. My only issue is with the quantity given. I did not receive three bottles as listed.
customer_reviews.author: Frances LeClere

customer_reviews.title: I do not like soy in anything but I love Hellmans Mayo
customer_reviews.text: This is the one I always use. To help hold on to the jar I put 2 rubber bands on the outside of the bottle and I can hold onto it well. I am doing Keto so it is a large help. I do not like soy in anything but I love Hellmans Mayo. I found a recipe for "tastes like Hellmans" mayo on line and she used MCT oil and some avocado oil. Can't wait to see if I like it. This is a great oil, no taste, never have had any problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Thistle

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. My only complaint is the bottle top, it’s a screw off top while other competitors use a squeeze top that makes it much easier to pour and measure accurately. It would be nice to see Now Foods step up with a better top. If not for the top I’d rate it 5 stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: DoberDad

customer_reviews.title: Colon Blow
customer_reviews.text: I've heard good things about MCT oil, but it gave me some pretty bad intestinal distress. I guess it's not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: StuckInNOVA

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 bottle
customer_reviews.text: No 3 pack for this Product only 1 ..I even called Amazon before purchasing. And they said 3pk ..Only one bottle .Deceptive advertising...1
customer_reviews.author: drum

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Bottle! Yuck! False Advertising ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. The MCT was shipped in a plastic bottle not a glass one. Very disappointed as I expected I was purchasing Now Foods MCT in glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime User

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy for C8:C10
customer_reviews.text: I can't claim the taste is great. It really is rather neutral in taste. It is however a great buy when one is looking for C8 and C10.
customer_reviews.author: bleach

customer_reviews.title: Put it in your coffee every day
customer_reviews.text: This goes into my coffee every morning and I have not a single thought of food until at least Noon but usually later. I've dropped several pants sizes and I'm finally getting my BGLs under control as a prediabetic.
customer_reviews.author: Dalebert Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Actually the package must still be on our porch. We evacuated our town 5 days ago. We have been using the product for a while. It’s as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Herbee

customer_reviews.title: Use every day.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this MCT Oil before and use it as part of my Keto life style.
customer_reviews.author: PMC

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on some good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Much cheaper than bulletproof and with better taste.
customer_reviews.author: BaylorAlumnus

customer_reviews.title: helping me
customer_reviews.text: Lose belly fat! I will continue to use on a daily basis. Great stuff
customer_reviews.author: mary e. campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good value and great for my diet
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing Now brand MCT oil from Amazon in the 3-pack for about 10 months now. Add an ounce to my BP coffee each morning, plus use a bit here and there for other cooking. The benefit of the BP diet on my health has been amazing. From what I have seen, NOW brands is a good value and effective substitute for the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Just great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product. It accomplished exactly what it should. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mardell Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use flip top. No taste, very healthy oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value inconvenient bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Good MCT oil. Transfered it to an existing squeeze bottle from a more expensive but technically not better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Plautz

customer_reviews.title: If you are drinking drinking paleo coffee every morning, ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are drinking drinking paleo coffee every morning, this is very high quality MCT oil, and is the cheapest I could find.
customer_reviews.author: PhoneBoy

product_meta.title: Now Foods 100% MCT Oil 32 Ounce
product_meta.description: One 32 oz Bottle. Natural color variation may occur in this product.
